Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Other Income (Expense): business combination contingent consideration arrangements change in amount of contingent consideration liability1
disposal group not discontinued operation gain loss on disposal
disposal group not discontinued operation loss gain on write down
gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on sale of investments
income associated with differential membership interests
income loss from equity method investments
other than temporary impairment gain loss on securities held in nuclear decommissioning funds
other than temporary impairment losses on securities held in nuclear decomissioning funds

Depreciation and Amortization: depreciation and amortization excluding nuclear fuel
Other Operating Expenses: fuel purchased power and interchange expense
impairment of long lived assets held for use
utilities operating expense maintenance and operations

Other Comprehensive Income: amount recognized in net periodic benefit cost and other comprehensive income loss before tax
unrealized gains losses on securities held in nuclear decommissioning funds

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share cash paid
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per basic share
net income loss attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest
public utilities allowance for funds used during construction capitalized cost of equity
taxes excluding income and excise taxes
